_header: Saint Luke the gospeller sayeth us
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Circumcision, feast of
_description: Gospel for the Feast of the Circumcision in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Luyk þe gospeller seiþ vsAnd spekeþ muche her
                    of Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He graunt vs alle such pardounÞat ȝaf his lyf for
                    vre Raunsoun. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
In die circumcisionis domine euaungelum secundum lucam (f.
                        173ra)
